title: I bitched about there not being bans but this is ridiculous
body:
First you dont ban people for legit breaking the rules.

Now you ban me for my game freezing on loading screen?

Riot either turn off reports entirely or make sure they work properly, fucking pick one mate.

Legit though 5 low prio queues because my game never left the load screen and i didnt notice till about 5 minutes into the game and had to restart the client manually to get it to actually load in. basically 1 and a half hours of punishment for 5 minutes of YOUR fuckup with the client (i run a fairly decent pc so we can rule out hardware issues, and i dont run any conflicting software either)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear you were banned due to issues with your client, were you actually banned? or did you just receive a leaverbuster punishment?

If your account was banned and you wish to have the ban reviewed you're going to have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support, however if you only received a leaverbuster punishment then these cannot be reversed and are automated, you should ensure your client is working correctly before joining a normal game by playing a custom game with bots.

When you say Riot don't ban people for breaking the rules, have you reported those people? Riot staff work very hard reviewing reports, however this takes time so don't expect people to be banned instantly for breaking the rules.

It was just a leaver buster punishment, unfortunately ive already knocked out a majority of my low prio queue games so appealing it would not be worth the time.

As for when i say people dont get banned im referring to reports, im aware you guys moved to an automatic report system recently that handles all minor offences and from what im seeing it isnt catching alot of the reports and falsely recognizing them as false reports.

This is not the fault of the riot staff perse but rather whoever is working on the algorithm used to check said reports.

In that regard i am aware of many people who repeatedly troll every game they play without fail and have been doing so undetected for many many months despite being reported en masse.

Frankly id find that making the algorithm more diligent while increasing the number of wrongly banned people would infact catch these outliers who consistently slip past the system, and those that get wrongly banned can still appeal the ban if they truly believe they didnt deserve the report that resulted in it.

That or the obvious solution of bringing back the tribunal system which was very effective, but as we havnt had that system for many years now during the "revamps" riot has either given up on improving that system or has some other reason as to why the revamps never got finished.

Edit: As for making sure my client works properly it does, this is a very rare issue that may happen once out of every hundred games i play, infact i havnt failed to load in in about a year now till today.

>It was just a leaver buster punishment, unfortunately ive already knocked out a majority of my low prio queue games so appealing it would not be worth the time.

As stated above, Leaverbuster punishments cannot be reversed therefore there is no point in appealing them.

>As for when i say people dont get banned im referring to reports, im aware you guys moved to an automatic report system recently that handles all minor offences and from what im seeing it isnt catching alot of the reports and falsely recognizing them as false reports.

>This is not the fault of the riot staff perse but rather whoever is working on the algorithm used to check said reports.

>In that regard i am aware of many people who repeatedly troll every game they play without fail and have been doing so undetected for many many months despite being reported en masse.

>Frankly id find that making the algorithm more diligent while increasing the number of wrongly banned people would infact catch these outliers who consistently slip past the system, and those that get wrongly banned can still appeal the ban if they truly believe they didnt deserve the report that resulted in it.

Could you elaborate on players "trolling"? judging from your post history the people you call trolls just happen to be unskilled players.

If you feel the automated system isn't working sufficiently and you wish to report a summoner out of game please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support with the players summoner name, what rules were broken and any other information you can provide.

I would give you a specific example but that would be name and shaming.

Also its interesting to find out you can report separately? is it possible to provide evidence supporting that report through things like video and such? if so i could probably clean up most of the community in about a day with the number of games i play (over-exaggerating but still i seem to encounter an abnormal number of genuine trolls for some reason)
